Package com.example.holosproject

package com.example.holosproject
  • Class
    Description
    AddEventActivity
    Activity for adding new events.
    AdminDashboardActivity
    FileName: AdminDashboardActivity Description: This is the Admin Dashboard activity, which provides access to various functionalities for an admin user, such as viewing profiles, events, and images, as well as navigating to other dashboard screens.
    AdminDashboardTest
    FileName: AdminDashboardTest Description: Runs tests relating to the admin dashboard.
    AdministratorCreation
    FileName: AdministratorCreation Description: This activity allows for the creation of administrators.
    AdminViewEventsActivity
    FileName: AdminViewEventsActivity Description: Admin can view all events on Firebase, and can delete them.
    AdminViewEventsAdapter
    FileName: AdminViewEventsAdapter Description: Adapter for the RecyclerView used within the Admin View Events page.
    AdminViewImagesActivity
    FileName: AdminViewImagesActivity Description: The activity used to display all images uploaded to the app, as well as ability to delete them.
    AdminViewImagesAdapter
    FileName: AdminViewImagesAdapter Adapter used for images within the Admin view of all images.
    AdminViewImagesAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class to hold references to the views for each item in the RecyclerView.
    AdminViewProfilesActivity
    FileName: AdminViewProfilesActivity Description: Admin can view all user profiles, and tap on them to prompt a deletion AdminViewProfilesActivity is associated with the admin_view_profiles.xml, and the admin_view_profiles_list_item.xml
    AdminViewProfilesAdapter
    FileName: AdminViewProfilesAdapter Adapter for the recyclerview used to view all user profiles in the admin panel
    AdminViewProfilesAdapter.ItemClickListener
    Interface for defining click listener for RecyclerView items.
    AttendeeCheckin
    The AttendeeCheckin class represents attendee check-in information, including the attendee's name and the number of times they have checked in.
    AttendeeCheckinsActivity
    Activity to display attendee check-ins for a specific event.
    AttendeeCheckinsAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying attendee check-ins in a ListView.
    AttendeeDashboardActivity
    FileName: AttendeeDashboardActivity Description: This is the logic for the AttendeeDashboard activity.
    AttendeeDashboardEventsAdapter
    FileName: AttendeeDashboardEventsAdapter Description: This is the adapter for the RecyclerView that we use to display Events within the Attendee Dashboard.
    AttendeeListActivity
    FileName: AdminViewProfilesActivity Description: Admin can view all user profiles, and tap on them to prompt a deletion AdminViewProfilesActivity is associated with the admin_view_profiles.xml, and the admin_view_profiles_list_item.xml
    CaptureAct
    A default CaptureActivity.
    EditProfileActivity
    FileName: EditProfileActivity Description: Contains the logic for Editing a users profile.
    Event
    FileName: Event Description: This is the Event Class.
    EventDisplay
    This class is used to display the details of an event, as well as prompting a user to check in.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FirstTimeProfileCreationActivity
    FileName: FirstTimeProfileCreationActivity Description: This is the activity that is shown after a user selects their role, prompting them to create a profile by entering their information.
    ImageUploader
    FileName: ImageUploader Description: Handles uploading images to firebase Note: As of 2024-03-26 Only works for profile images.
    ImageUploader.ImageUploadListener
    An interface used to keep track of an image being uploaded successfully / unsuccessfully.
    Login
    The class used to login to an administrator account.
    MainActivity
    FileName: MainActivity Description: checks if user is signed in and navigates them to their destination or login
    MockDataProvider
    FileName: MockDataProvider Description: Provides mock data to relevant views when running App Tests.
    NavigationDrawerUtils
    Utility class for updating the navigation drawer header with user information.
    OrganizerCreation
    FileName: FirstTimeProfileCreationActivity Description: This is the activity that is shown after a user selects their role, prompting them to create a profile by entering their information.
    OrganizerDashboardActivity
    OrganizerDashboardActivity: Represents the dashboard for organizers.
    OrganizerDashboardEventsAdapter
    An adapter based on a typical RecyclerView adapter that is used to display the list of events an organizer has created.
    OrganizerMapActivity
    OrganizerMapActivity displays a map for organizers.
    PrintDisplay
    This activity is used to display a bare-bones event poster with a promo code
    PromoScanTest
    A basic test of handling a promotion code being scanned.
    QRGen
    This screen is used to generate / display two different QR codes, One is the promotional QR code, with the format "promo" + [EVENT ID] The other is the check-in code, which may be custom, or by default contains the string [EVENT ID] when scanned.
    QRScanTest
    A basic test to handle scanning a check-in QR code.
    TestAttendeeDashboardActivity
    FileName: AttendeeDashboardActivity Description: This is the logic for the AttendeeDashboard activity.
    TestEventDisplay
    A dummy version of the Event Display screen (so we don't have to deal with Firebase).
    TestSuccessScreen
    The screen a user is sent to every time they open the app, handling things based on their user.
    TestViewAllEventsActivity
    FileName: ViewAllEventsActivity Description: Activity for viewing all events within the app, as an attendee Brought to this screen when a user selects the "View All Events" option from the drawer menu.
    UploadManager
    Manages the upload status of images.
    UserProfile
    Represents a user's profile within the database, Used to both write to and access a user's data.
    ViewAllEventsActivity
    FileName: ViewAllEventsActivity Description: Activity for viewing all events within the app, as an attendee Brought to this screen when a user selects the "View All Events" option from the drawer menu.
